caller_intent: Christina from North Edge Steel is requesting insurance information and the CLI (Customer Lifetime Identifier) for a contractor named Eric Alvarez Mendoza, specifically for an address in rural Hall, North Carolina, and wants the information sent to C Chavez at North Edge Steel.
resolution_steps: Cody confirms the contractor's full name (Eric Alvarez Mendoza).
Verifies the address (rural Hall, North Carolina).
Obtains the email address (C Chavez at North Edge Steel US).
Informs Christina he will send the requested information shortly.
knowledge_required: Understanding of CLI (Customer Lifetime Identifier) and insurance information retrieval processes
Handling requests for contractor-related insurance data
systems_referenced: Internal system for retrieving insurance information and CLI data
summary: Christina from North Edge Steel requested insurance information and the CLI for contractor Eric Alvarez Mendoza. Cody confirmed the details and committed to sending the information to C Chavez at North Edge Steel. The call concluded with mutual thanks and a promise to follow up.
